alert.note: Alert for Marion; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 11:04AM EST until March 10 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... White River and Eel River. .Ongoing and renewed flooding will continue or develop along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers over the next 24 to 48 hours and beyond. River stages are rising again due to the one to over two and a half inches of rain received from Saturday night through this morning. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Ravenswood. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water surrounds homes in River Edge Estates. A few streets flood in Ravenswood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 7.2 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued later this evening.
